original_text: because a great door for effective work has opened to me, and there are many who oppose me.
korean_text: 내게 광대하고 유효한 문이 열렸으나 대적하는 자가 많음이라

sentences.original_text: because a great door for effective work has opened to me
sentences.korean_translation: 효과적인 일을 위한 위대한 문이 내게 열렸기 때문입니다

sentences.original_text: and there are many who oppose me
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 나를 반대하는 자들이 많이 있습니다
